events.event_desc:
Art and self-expression, the tools of our time, come to their pinnacle in the
theater. With immaculate expressions and extensive exuberance, bring the stage to life. Make it yours and evolve from being to an ethereal form remembered for eons. Perform and make some magic
To mark the beginning of Revels, Crescendo presents Rock Mob! Join us at Student Plaza as a mob of musicians showcase a medley of rock music.
Calligraphy

Learn to speak Kannada

Tug of war is a sport in which twiteams pull on opposite ends of a rope, with the goal being to bring the rope a certain distance in one direction against the force of the opposing team's pull.
Chess is an abstract strategy game . It is played on a chessboard with 64 squares arranged in an eight-by-eight grid.

Basketball is a team sport in which two teams, compete with the primary objective of shooting a basketball through the defender's hoop.
This is an event only for MIT Students.
Basketball is a team sport in which two teams, compete with the primary objective of shooting a basketball through the defender's hoop.
Futsal is a football-based game played on a hard court smaller than a football pitch, and mainly indoors.
Box cricket or indoor cricket is a variant of cricket with added enhancements to improve the engagement and enjoyment of casual players.
Throwball is a non-contact ball sport played across a net between two teams of nine players on a rectangular court.
Athletics is a group of sporting events that involves competitive running, jumping, throwing, and walking.
Athletics is a group of sporting events that involves competitive running, jumping, throwing, and walking.
MAX TWO TEAMS FROM EACH UNIVERSITY
Tennis is a racket sport in which a  tennis racket that is strung with cord to strike a hollow rubber ball covered with felt over or around a net and into the opponent's court.
Tennis is a racket sport in which a  tennis racket that is strung with cord to strike a hollow rubber ball covered with felt over or around a net and into the opponent's court.
Squash is a racket-and-ball sport played by two or four players in a four-walled court with a small, hollow, rubber ball.
Teams play against each other by trying to manoeuvre the object of play, either a type of ball or a disk (such as a puck), into the opponent's goal using a hockey stick.
Teams play against each other by trying to maneuver the object of play, either a type of ball or a disk (such as a puck), into the opponent's goal using a hockey stick.
MAX OF TWO TEAMS FROM ONE UNIVERSITY
Table tennis, is a racket sport derived from tennis but distinguished by its playing surface being atop a stationary table
Table tennis, is a racket sport derived from tennis but distinguished by its playing surface being atop a stationary table.
Volleyball is a team sport in which Each team tries to score points by grounding a ball on the other team's court under organized rules.
Volleyball is a team sport in which Each team tries to score points by grounding a ball on the other team's court under organized rules.
Swimming is an individual or team racing sport that requires the use of one's entire body to move through water.
Swimming is an individual or team racing sport that requires the use of one's entire body to move through water.
Football is a family of team sports that involve, kicking a ball to score a goal.
Football is a family of team sports that involve, kicking a ball to score a goal.
Chess is an abstract strategy game . It is played on a chessboard with 64 squares arranged in an eight-by-eight grid.

Baketball for women
(non mit)
Basketball is a team sport in which two teams,compete with the primary objective of shooting a basketball through the defender's hoop
Cricket is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams. The batting side scores runs by striking the ball bowled while the bowling and fielding side tries to prevent this
MAX TWO TEAMS FROM ONE UNIVERSITY
WOMEN EVENT
Badminton is a racquet sport played using racquets to hit a shuttlecock across a net.

Step into the next level of laser tag excitement as traditional laser guns are replaced with innovative gel blasters, adding a new dimension of realism to the battlefield. This high-energy event will take you to a neon-soaked arena, where the glow of your gear and the thrill of the game combine for an unforgettable night of laser tag excitement. Each game session involves a team of six players entering a designated area.

This event will primarily consist of participants photographing the products provided by us and the result is expected to be pleasing and advertisable. Groups of 2 or 3 may be formed depending on the choice of participants, and each participating team is given a product. Each team is given 45 minutes to shoot necessary pictures and another 45 minutes are given for editing, if required by the team.
Prize: Rs.2000

Abstract Art is all about celebrating the diverse and innovative expressions within
the realm of abstract visual art.

Sketchorama is a competition for a team. So get your friends and indulge in a
thrilling experience that is sure to leave you pumped throughout the event. The
team will attempt to finish a drawing in 4 parts, without having discussed it
beforehand. A prompt will be given to the first person and the others will have to
interpret and finish it.

This event will look to test
participantsâ€™ knowledge of some of the most popular TV shows and movies of our time, such
as Brooklyn 99, The Office, How I Met Your Mother, and Friends. There will be a mixture of 5-6 shows of different genres
appearing in all the 3 rounds. Teams will complete certain mini-games and
answer extremely in-depth trivia about the TV shows and movies.

"A single-round team event where the teams perform a ramp walk based on the theme of the event and are asked questions about the same. The winner is decided by a panel of judges.
"

Prize pool: 30000 | For more information regarding the event, find the rules at  https://drive.google.com/drive/u/8/folders/1vSpOjolw5hv35m3Uku-GHdz3mNYDtPQf
Venue, Date and Time is subject to change | This is a Western dance competition where groups of dancers (with a minimum of six and a maximum of twenty members) compete against each other to get their hands on the cash prize.

A national-level debate tournament that follows the British Parliamentary format.
Recognized debaters from all over the country participate in multiple rounds to
prove their argumentation and make their way to the top. Nuanced motions and
thrilling back-and-forths make MITDT the wild ride that it is.

The most energetic form of theatre is where teams try to spread awareness about a
social cause on top of their voices amongst a gathered audience. This is one of the
highlight events of the festival.

Art and self-expression, the tools of our time, come to their pinnacle in the
theater. With immaculate expressions and extensive exuberance, bring the stage
to life. Make it yours and evolve from being to an ethereal form remembered for
eons. Perform and make some magic.

The crash of a cymbal, the thump of a bass, the bend of a guitar, and the deafening din of the crowd. If these words sound like home to you, the Revels '24 Battle of the Bands- The Big Band Theory'' stage is exactly where you can experience this. With adrenaline pumping through your veins, blow the roof off in this final Grandstand.

Prize pool: 11500 | For more information regarding the event, find the rules in rule book  Venue, Date and Time is subject to change | Bollywood has always been a medium for all of us to express our emotions and intentions. It has always played an instrumental role in helping us know what we feel, how we feel, and why we feel. In layman's terms, Bollywood is our life, and our life is Bollywood!

The path to success isn't an easy one, and this must be ingrained into a ninja's mind. Conquering mental challenges and hunts, are you trained enough to be one of Konoha's chunins? Referencing The Chunin Exam from Naruto, an exam round will be followed by tasks and a treasure hunt.

Venue, Date and Time is subject to change | An individual event, where participants represent various fictitious/non-fictitious characters and convincingly persuade the judges that they are the most deserving of the one parachute left in a plane that is about to crash.

Teams of 2 are put through spree of challenges and endurance tests that rile up the inner warrior inside you to get past them and get to the finish line first. With the timer breathing down your neck and the course demanding everything that youâ€™ve got within you, this event really tests you both mentally and physically and demands you to give your everything.

Get ready to sharpen your clue-solving skills in our thrilling challenge! Time to navigate the campus, tackling an array of mind-bending tasks and intricate challenges to unveil the next clue. Race against time, decode clues, and be the first two teams to finish the entire hunt, abiding by all the rules, to claim victory!
Prize pool: 10000

This event combines Spot Photography with the element of storytelling. Participants will be gathered and given a genre on the spot, after which they will have 1 hour to use their photography to tell a story containing the genre. A minimum of 3 photos is required to submit as a story. 
Prize: Rs. 2000
